description.value:
The magic of your patron ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Warlock level specified in the Archfey Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Archfey Spells
Warlock LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCalmEmotio]{Calm Emotions}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFaerieFire]{Faerie Fire}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGuidance00]{Guidance}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplPhantasFor]{Phantasmal Force}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSleep00000]{Sleep}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplViciousMoc]{Vicious Mockery}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBlink00000]{Blink}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplPlantGrowt]{Plant Growth}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDominateBe]{Dominate Beast}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGreaterInv]{Greater Invisibility}
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDominatePe]{Dominate Person}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSeeming000]{Seeming}
